channel.title: Occassional Total System Freeze
channel.description:
It only happens every now and then, but it's very serious. Sometimes, I'll be in the middle of a game and it freezes up completely. I can't Ctrl+Alt+Delete out, and Windows has completely frozen up. The only thing I can do at that point is force a shutdown. Usually, it happens around voting time. It's especially a problem because this isn't one of those games where you can just drop out in the middle of it.
I am a new user, so I can't upload any files, but here are some mediafire links to my output log.
[Mediafire link](http://www.mediafire.com/file/77mufdqc4w48rpd/output_log.txt)
Plus, here's a crash log from a while back. It's the only one I have, because the freeze-up doesn't produce crash logs. I'm not sure if the crash was related to the freeze, but it's worth an upload.
[Mediafire link](http://www.mediafire.com/folder/duxxv64klbcp6/2018-04-23_203326)
Here are my specs: AMD Athlon II X4 640 AMD Radeon HD 6700 Series 8 GB Ram Windows 7 Home Premium, 64-Bit
I enjoy this game, but until this gets fixed, I'll have to stop playing for the good of my aging computer.
